game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you embark on a thrilling adventure to find the lost treasure of the ancient kingdom. Solve puzzles, face challenges, and overcome obstacles to discover the valuable treasure that has been hidden for centuries.
game.reward: Ancient artifact and a bag of gold coins

task.@description: Your journey begins at the old library. Search for a hidden message in an ancient book that will lead you to the next clue.
Use your wit to decipher the mysterious riddle inscribed on a stone tablet. The riddle holds the key to unlocking the next clue.
Venture into the treacherous cave and retrieve the key hidden deep within. The key is essential to unlocking the final secret location where the treasure awaits.
Follow the clues and navigate through a complex maze to reach the hidden chamber. Inside lies the legendary treasure.
